Top and Bottom.title: Setting the Top and Bottom Areas
Setting the Top and Bottom Areas

disable_wpautop.label: Filter
disable_wpautop.description: Disable the wpautop filter for the_content and the_excerpt.

disable_emojis.description: Disable conversion of Emoji characters to images.

minimum_stability.label: Minimum Stability
minimum_stability.description: The minimum stability of the theme updates. Stable is recommended for production websites, Beta is only for testing new features and reporting issues.

post.width.label: Width
post.width.description: Set the post width. The image and content can't expand beyond this width.

post.content_width.label: Content Width
post.content_width.description: Set an optional content width which doesn't affect the image.

post.image_align.label: Image Alignment
post.image_align.description: Align the image to the top or place it between the title and the content.

post.image_margin.label: Image Margin
post.image_margin.description: Set the top margin if the image is aligned between the title and the content.

post.image_dimension.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

post.header_align.label: Alignment
post.header_align.description: Align the title and meta text.
post.header_align.text: Center the title and meta text

post.meta_align.label: Meta Alignment
post.meta_align.description: Position the meta text above or below the title.

post.meta_style.label: Meta Style
post.meta_style.description: Display the meta text in a sentence or a horizontal list.

post.content_dropcap.label: Drop Cap
post.content_dropcap.description: Set a large initial letter that drops below the first line of the first paragraph.

post.navigation.label: Navigation
post.navigation.description: Enable a navigation to move to the previous or next post.

post.tags.description: Show system fields for single posts. This option does not apply to the blog.

blog.grid_column_gap.label: Column Gap
blog.grid_column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid columns.

blog.grid_row_gap.label: Row Gap
blog.grid_row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid rows.

blog.grid_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
blog.grid_breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid items will stack.

blog.grid_masonry.label: Masonry
blog.grid_masonry.description: The masonry effect creates a layout free of gaps even if grid items have different heights.

blog.grid_parallax.label: Parallax
blog.grid_parallax.description: The parallax effect moves single grid columns at different speeds while scrolling. Define the vertical parallax offset in pixels.

blog.image_align.label: Image Alignment
blog.image_align.description: Align the image to the top or place it between the title and the content.

blog.image_margin.label: Image Margin
blog.image_margin.description: Set the top margin if the image is aligned between the title and the content.

blog.image_dimension.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

blog.header_align.label: Alignment
blog.header_align.description: Align the title and meta text as well as the continue reading button.
blog.header_align.text: Center the title, meta text and button

blog.title_style.label: Title Style
blog.title_style.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

blog.content_excerpt.label: Content
blog.content_excerpt.description: Show the excerpt in the blog overview instead of the post text.

blog.content_length.label: Content Length
blog.content_length.description: Limit the content length to a number of characters. All HTML elements will be stripped.

blog.button_style.label: Button
blog.button_style.description: Select a style for the continue reading button.

blog.navigation.label: Navigation
blog.navigation.description: Use a numeric pagination or previous/next links to move between blog pages.

blog.category_title.description: Show system fields for the blog. This option does not apply to single posts.
